amendment.description: An amendment numbered 2 printed in Part C of House Report 117-432 to add language to expand pre- and post-fire weather assessments to include identification of data collection gaps, accuracy and efficiency of fire weather forecasting, and post-incident assessments.
amendment.purpose: Amendment adds language to expand pre- and post-fire weather assessments to include identification of data collection gaps, accuracy and efficiency of fire weather forecasting, and post-incident assessments.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Schrier amendment (A002) Agreed to by recorded vote: 223 - 203 (Roll no. 411).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A002) offered by Ms. Schrier.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Schrier amendment (A002) Agreed to by recorded vote: 223 - 203 (Roll no. 411).
